verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֤חַ ׀ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician לְעֶ֥בֶד <S%H5650><s%> the servant יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> [A Psalm] of David אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who דִּבֶּ֨ר ׀ <S%H1696><s%> who spake לַיהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דִּ֭בְרֵי <S%H1697><s%> the words הַשִּׁירָ֣ה <S%H7892><s%> of this song הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> in בְּי֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day הִֽצִּיל־ <S%H5337><s%> delivered יְהוָ֘ה <S%H3068><s%> [that] the LORD אוֹת֥וֹ <S%H853><s%> מִכַּ֥ף <S%H3709><s%> him from the hand כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all אֹ֝יְבָ֗יו <S%H341><s%> of all his enemies וּמִיַּ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> and from the hand שָׁאֽוּל׃ <S%H7586><s%> of Saul וַיֹּאמַ֡ר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֶרְחָמְךָ֖ <S%H7355><s%> I will love יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> thee O LORD חִזְקִֽי׃ <S%H2391><s%> my strength

יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD סַֽלְעִ֥י <S%H5553><s%> [is] my rock וּמְצוּדָתִ֗י <S%H4686><s%> and my fortress וּמְפַ֫לְטִ֥י <S%H6403><s%> and my deliverer אֵלִ֣י <S%H410><s%> my God צ֭וּרִי <S%H6697><s%> my strength אֶֽחֱסֶה־ <S%H2620><s%> in whom I will trust בּ֑וֹ מָֽגִנִּ֥י <S%H4043><s%> my buckler וְקֶֽרֶן־ <S%H7161><s%> and the horn יִ֝שְׁעִ֗י <S%H3468><s%> of my salvation מִשְׂגַּבִּֽי׃ <S%H4869><s%> [and] my high tower

מְ֭הֻלָּל <S%H1984><s%> [who is worthy] to be praised אֶקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> I will call יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> upon the LORD וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at אֹ֝יְבַ֗י <S%H341><s%> from mine enemies אִוָּשֵֽׁעַ׃ <S%H3467><s%> so shall I be saved

אֲפָפ֥וּנִי <S%H661><s%> compassed חֶבְלֵי־ <S%H2256><s%> The sorrows מָ֑וֶת <S%H4194><s%> of death וְֽנַחֲלֵ֖י <S%H5158><s%> me and the floods בְלִיַּ֣עַל <S%H1100><s%> of ungodly men יְבַֽעֲתֽוּנִי׃ <S%H1204><s%> made me afraid

חֶבְלֵ֣י <S%H2256><s%> The sorrows שְׁא֣וֹל <S%H7585><s%> of hell סְבָב֑וּנִי <S%H5437><s%> compassed me about קִ֝דְּמ֗וּנִי <S%H6923><s%> prevented מ֣וֹקְשֵׁי <S%H4170><s%> the snares מָֽוֶת׃ <S%H4194><s%> of death

בַּצַּר־ <S%H6862><s%> In my distress לִ֤י ׀ אֶֽקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> I called יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> upon the LORD וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֱלֹהַ֪י <S%H430><s%> unto my God אֲשַׁ֫וֵּ֥עַ <S%H7768><s%> and cried יִשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> he heard מֵהֵיכָל֣וֹ <S%H1964><s%> out of his temple קוֹלִ֑י <S%H6963><s%> my voice וְ֝שַׁוְעָתִ֗י <S%H7775><s%> and my cry לְפָנָ֤יו ׀ <S%H6440><s%> before תָּב֬וֹא <S%H935><s%> came בְאָזְנָֽיו׃ <S%H241><s%> him [even] into his ears

וַתִּגְעַ֬שׁ <S%H1607><s%> shook וַתִּרְעַ֨שׁ ׀ <S%H7493><s%> and trembled הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> Then the earth וּמוֹסְדֵ֣י <S%H4146><s%> the foundations הָרִ֣ים <S%H2022><s%> also of the hills יִרְגָּ֑זוּ <S%H7264><s%> moved וַ֝יִּתְגָּֽעֲשׁ֗וּ <S%H1607><s%> and were shaken כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> because חָ֥רָה <S%H2734><s%> because he was wroth לֽוֹ׃

עָ֘לָ֤ה <S%H5927><s%> There went up עָשָׁ֨ן ׀ <S%H6227><s%> a smoke בְּאַפּ֗וֹ <S%H639><s%> out of his nostrils וְאֵשׁ־ <S%H784><s%> and fire מִפִּ֥יו <S%H6310><s%> out of his mouth תֹּאכֵ֑ל <S%H398><s%> devoured גֶּ֝חָלִ֗ים <S%H1513><s%> coals בָּעֲר֥וּ <S%H1197><s%> were kindled מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> at

וַיֵּ֣ט <S%H5186><s%> He bowed שָׁ֭מַיִם <S%H8064><s%> the heavens וַיֵּרַ֑ד <S%H3381><s%> also and came down וַ֝עֲרָפֶ֗ל <S%H6205><s%> and darkness תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> under רַגְלָֽיו׃ <S%H7272><s%> [was] under his feet

וַיִּרְכַּ֣ב <S%H7392><s%> And he rode עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon כְּ֭רוּב <S%H3742><s%> upon a cherub וַיָּעֹ֑ף <S%H5774><s%> and did fly וַ֝יֵּ֗דֶא <S%H1675><s%> yea he did fly עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon כַּנְפֵי־ <S%H3671><s%> upon the wings רֽוּחַ׃ <S%H7307><s%> of the wind

יָ֤שֶׁת <S%H7896><s%> He made חֹ֨שֶׁךְ ׀ <S%H2822><s%> darkness סִתְר֗וֹ <S%H5643><s%> his secret place סְבִֽיבוֹתָ֥יו <S%H5439><s%> round about סֻכָּת֑וֹ <S%H5521><s%> his pavilion חֶשְׁכַת־ <S%H2824><s%> him [were] dark מַ֝֗יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters עָבֵ֥י <S%H5645><s%> [and] thick clouds שְׁחָקִֽים׃ <S%H7834><s%> of the skies

מִנֹּ֗גַהּ <S%H5051><s%> At the brightness נֶ֫גְדּ֥וֹ <S%H5048><s%> before עָבָ֥יו <S%H5645><s%> [that was] before him his thick clouds עָבְר֑וּ <S%H5674><s%> passed בָּ֝רָ֗ד <S%H1259><s%> hail וְגַֽחֲלֵי־ <S%H1513><s%> [stones] and coals אֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> of fire

וַיַּרְעֵ֬ם <S%H7481><s%> also thundered בַּשָּׁמַ֨יִם ׀ <S%H8064><s%> in the heavens יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD וְ֭עֶלְיוֹן <S%H5945><s%> and the Highest יִתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> gave קֹל֑וֹ <S%H6963><s%> his voice בָּ֝רָ֗ד <S%H1259><s%> hail וְגַֽחֲלֵי־ <S%H1513><s%> [stones] and coals אֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> of fire

וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> Yea he sent out חִ֭צָּיו <S%H2671><s%> his arrows וַיְפִיצֵ֑ם <S%H6327><s%> and scattered וּבְרָקִ֥ים <S%H1300><s%> lightnings רָ֝ב <S%H7232><s%> them and he shot out וַיְהֻמֵּֽם׃ <S%H2000><s%> and discomfited

וַיֵּ֤רָא֨וּ ׀ <S%H7200><s%> were seen אֲפִ֥יקֵי <S%H650><s%> Then the channels מַ֗יִם <S%H4325><s%> of waters וַֽיִּגָּלוּ֮ <S%H1540><s%> were discovered מוֹסְד֪וֹת <S%H4146><s%> and the foundations תֵּ֫בֵ֥ל <S%H8398><s%> of the world מִגַּעֲרָ֣תְךָ֣ <S%H1606><s%> at thy rebuke יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD מִ֝נִּשְׁמַ֗ת <S%H5397><s%> at the blast ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> of the breath אַפֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H639><s%> of thy nostrils

יִשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> He sent מִ֭מָּרוֹם <S%H4791><s%> from above יִקָּחֵ֑נִי <S%H3947><s%> he took יַֽ֝מְשֵׁ֗נִי <S%H4871><s%> me he drew מִמַּ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters רַבִּֽים׃ <S%H7227><s%> me out of many

יַצִּילֵ֗נִי <S%H5337><s%> He delivered מֵאֹיְבִ֥י <S%H341><s%> enemy עָ֑ז <S%H5794><s%> me from my strong וּ֝מִשֹּׂנְאַ֗י <S%H8130><s%> and from them which hated כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אָמְצ֥וּ <S%H553><s%> me for they were too strong מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <S%H4480><s%> were too

יְקַדְּמ֥וּנִי <S%H6923><s%> They prevented בְיוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> me in the day אֵידִ֑י <S%H343><s%> of my calamity וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> become יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> but the LORD לְמִשְׁעָ֣ן <S%H4937><s%> was my stay לִֽי׃

וַיּוֹצִיאֵ֥נִי <S%H3318><s%> He brought me forth לַמֶּרְחָ֑ב <S%H4800><s%> also into a large place יְ֝חַלְּצֵ֗נִי <S%H2502><s%> he delivered כִּ֘י <S%H3588><s%> because חָ֥פֵֽץ <S%H2654><s%> me because he delighted בִּֽי׃

יִגְמְלֵ֣נִי <S%H1580><s%> rewarded יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD כְּצִדְקִ֑י <S%H6664><s%> me according to my righteousness כְּבֹ֥ר <S%H1252><s%> according to the cleanness יָ֝דַ֗י <S%H3027><s%> of my hands יָשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> hath he recompensed לִֽי׃

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for שָׁ֭מַרְתִּי <S%H8104><s%> For I have kept דַּרְכֵ֣י <S%H1870><s%> the ways יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not רָ֝שַׁ֗עְתִּי <S%H7561><s%> and have not wickedly departed מֵאֱלֹהָֽי׃ <S%H430><s%> from my God

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all מִשְׁפָּטָ֣יו <S%H4941><s%> For all his judgments לְנֶגְדִּ֑י <S%H5048><s%> were before וְ֝חֻקֹּתָ֗יו <S%H2708><s%> his statutes לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not אָסִ֥יר <S%H5493><s%> [were] before me and I did not put away מֶֽנִּי׃ <S%H4480><s%> at

וָאֱהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> was also תָמִ֣ים <S%H8549><s%> I was also upright עִמּ֑וֹ <S%H5973><s%> and I וָ֝אֶשְׁתַּמֵּ֗ר <S%H8104><s%> before him and I kept מֵעֲוֹנִֽי׃ <S%H5771><s%> myself from mine iniquity

וַיָּֽשֶׁב־ <S%H7725><s%> recompensed יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Therefore hath the LORD לִ֣י כְצִדְקִ֑י <S%H6664><s%> me according to my righteousness כְּבֹ֥ר <S%H1252><s%> according to the cleanness יָ֝דַ֗י <S%H3027><s%> of my hands לְנֶ֣גֶד <S%H5048><s%> in עֵינָֽיו׃ <S%H5869><s%> in his eyesight

עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> With חָסִ֥יד <S%H2623><s%> With the merciful תִּתְחַסָּ֑ד <S%H2616><s%> thou wilt shew thyself merciful עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with גְּבַ֥ר <S%H1399><s%> man תָּ֝מִ֗ים <S%H8549><s%> with an upright תִּתַּמָּֽם׃ <S%H8552><s%> thou wilt shew thyself upright

עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> With נָבָ֥ר <S%H1305><s%> With the pure תִּתְבָּרָ֑ר <S%H1305><s%> thou wilt shew thyself pure וְעִם־ <S%H5973><s%> and with עִ֝קֵּ֗שׁ <S%H6141><s%> and with the froward תִּתְפַּתָּֽל׃ <S%H6617><s%> thou wilt shew thyself froward

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אַ֭תָּה <S%H859><s%> you עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> people עָנִ֣י <S%H6041><s%> the afflicted תוֹשִׁ֑יעַ <S%H3467><s%> For thou wilt save וְעֵינַ֖יִם <S%H5869><s%> looks רָמ֣וֹת <S%H7311><s%> high תַּשְׁפִּֽיל׃ <S%H8213><s%> but wilt bring down

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אַ֭תָּה <S%H859><s%> You תָּאִ֣יר <S%H215><s%> For thou wilt light נֵרִ֑י <S%H5216><s%> my candle יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱ֝לֹהַ֗י <S%H430><s%> my God יַגִּ֥יהַּ <S%H5050><s%> will enlighten חָשְׁכִּֽי׃ <S%H2822><s%> my darkness

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for בְ֭ךָ אָרֻ֣ץ <S%H7323><s%> For by thee I have run through גְּד֑וּד <S%H1416><s%> a troop וּ֝בֵֽאלֹהַ֗י <S%H430><s%> and by my God אֲדַלֶּג־ <S%H1801><s%> have I leaped over שֽׁוּר׃ <S%H7791><s%> a wall

הָאֵל֮ <S%H410><s%> [As for] God תָּמִ֪ים <S%H8549><s%> [is] perfect דַּ֫רְכּ֥וֹ <S%H1870><s%> his way אִמְרַֽת־ <S%H565><s%> the word יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD צְרוּפָ֑ה <S%H6884><s%> is tried מָגֵ֥ן <S%H4043><s%> he [is] a buckler ה֝֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לְכֹ֤ל ׀ <S%H3605><s%> to all הַחֹסִ֬ים <S%H2620><s%> to all those that trust בּֽוֹ׃

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> who אֱ֭לוֹהַּ <S%H433><s%> For who [is] God מִבַּלְעֲדֵ֣י <S%H1107><s%> save יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Jehovah וּמִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> who צ֝֗וּר <S%H6697><s%> rock זוּלָתִ֥י <S%H2108><s%> save אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> our God

הָ֭אֵל <S%H410><s%> [It is] God הַמְאַזְּרֵ֣נִי <S%H247><s%> that girdeth חָ֑יִל <S%H2428><s%> me with strength וַיִּתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> and maketh תָּמִ֣ים <S%H8549><s%> perfect דַּרְכִּֽי׃ <S%H1870><s%> my way

מְשַׁוֶּ֣ה <S%H7737><s%> He maketh רַ֭גְלַי <S%H7272><s%> my feet כָּאַיָּל֑וֹת <S%H355><s%> like hinds' וְעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> upon בָּ֝מֹתַ֗י <S%H1116><s%> me upon my high places יַעֲמִידֵֽנִי׃ <S%H5975><s%> [feet] and setteth

מְלַמֵּ֣ד <S%H3925><s%> He teacheth יָ֭דַי <S%H3027><s%> my hands לַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> to war וְֽנִחֲתָ֥ה <S%H5181><s%> is broken קֶֽשֶׁת־ <S%H7198><s%> so that a bow נְ֝חוּשָׁ֗ה <S%H5154><s%> of steel זְרוֹעֹתָֽי׃ <S%H2220><s%> by mine arms

וַתִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> Thou hast also given לִי֮ מָגֵ֪ן <S%H4043><s%> me the shield יִ֫שְׁעֶ֥ךָ <S%H3468><s%> of thy salvation וִֽימִינְךָ֥ <S%H3225><s%> and thy right hand תִסְעָדֵ֑נִי <S%H5582><s%> hath holden me up וְֽעַנְוַתְךָ֥ <S%H6037><s%> and thy gentleness תַרְבֵּֽנִי׃ <S%H7235><s%> hath made me great

תַּרְחִ֣יב <S%H7337><s%> Thou hast enlarged צַעֲדִ֣י <S%H6806><s%> my steps תַחְתָּ֑י <S%H8478><s%> under וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> have not מָ֝עֲד֗וּ <S%H4571><s%> did not slip קַרְסֻלָּֽי׃ <S%H7166><s%> under me that my feet

אֶרְדּ֣וֹף <S%H7291><s%> I have pursued א֭וֹיְבַי <S%H341><s%> mine enemies וְאַשִּׂיגֵ֑ם <S%H5381><s%> and overtaken וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not אָ֝שׁוּב <S%H7725><s%> them neither did I turn again עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until כַּלּוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H3615><s%> till they were consumed

אֶ֭מְחָצֵם <S%H4272><s%> I have wounded וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> were not יֻ֣כְלוּ <S%H3201><s%> them that they were not able ק֑וּם <S%H6965><s%> to rise יִ֝פְּל֗וּ <S%H5307><s%> they are fallen תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> under רַגְלָֽי׃ <S%H7272><s%> under my feet

וַתְּאַזְּרֵ֣נִי <S%H247><s%> For thou hast girded חַ֭יִל <S%H2428><s%> me with strength לַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> unto the battle תַּכְרִ֖יעַ <S%H3766><s%> thou hast subdued קָמַ֣י <S%H6965><s%> under me those that rose up תַּחְתָּֽי׃ <S%H8478><s%> under

וְֽאֹיְבַ֗י <S%H341><s%> of mine enemies נָתַ֣תָּה <S%H5414><s%> Thou hast also given לִּ֣י עֹ֑רֶף <S%H6203><s%> me the necks וּ֝מְשַׂנְאַ֗י <S%H8130><s%> them that hate אַצְמִיתֵֽם׃ <S%H6789><s%> that I might destroy

יְשַׁוְּע֥וּ <S%H7768><s%> They cried וְאֵין־ <S%H369><s%> there מוֹשִׁ֑יעַ <S%H3467><s%> but [there was] none to save עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> to יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> [them even] unto the LORD וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not עָנָֽם׃ <S%H6030><s%> but he answered

וְֽאֶשְׁחָקֵ֗ם <S%H7833><s%> Then did I beat כְּעָפָ֥ר <S%H6083><s%> them small as the dust עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and פְּנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> before ר֑וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> the wind כְּטִ֖יט <S%H2916><s%> as the dirt חוּצ֣וֹת <S%H2351><s%> in the streets אֲרִיקֵֽם׃ <S%H7324><s%> I did cast them out

תְּפַלְּטֵנִי֮ <S%H6403><s%> Thou hast delivered מֵרִ֪יבֵ֫י <S%H7379><s%> me from the strivings עָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people תְּ֭שִׂימֵנִי <S%H7760><s%> [and] thou hast made לְרֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> me the head גּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> of the heathen עַ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> a people לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not יָדַ֣עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> [whom] I have not known יַֽעַבְדֽוּנִי׃ <S%H5647><s%> shall serve

לְשֵׁ֣מַֽע <S%H8088><s%> bruit אֹ֭זֶן <S%H241><s%> they יִשָּׁ֣מְעוּ <S%H8085><s%> of me they shall obey לִ֑י בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted נֵ֝כָ֗ר <S%H5236><s%> alien יְכַחֲשׁוּ־ <S%H3584><s%> shall submit לִֽי׃

בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted נֵכָ֥ר <S%H5236><s%> alien יִבֹּ֑לוּ <S%H5034><s%> shall fade away וְ֝יַחְרְג֗וּ <S%H2727><s%> and be afraid מִֽמִּסְגְּרֽוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H4526><s%> out of their close places

חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> liveth יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD וּבָר֣וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> and blessed צוּרִ֑י <S%H6697><s%> [be] my rock וְ֝יָר֗וּם <S%H7311><s%> be exalted אֱלוֹהֵ֥י <S%H433><s%> God יִשְׁעִֽי׃ <S%H3468><s%> of my salvation

הָאֵ֗ל <S%H410><s%> [It is] God הַנּוֹתֵ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> executes נְקָמ֣וֹת <S%H5360><s%> vengeance לִ֑י וַיַּדְבֵּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> me and subdueth עַמִּ֣ים <S%H5971><s%> the people תַּחְתָּֽי׃ <S%H8478><s%> under

מְפַלְּטִ֗י <S%H6403><s%> He delivereth מֵאֹ֫יְבָ֥י <S%H341><s%> me from mine enemies אַ֣ף <S%H637><s%> Surely מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> above קָ֭מַי <S%H6965><s%> above those that rise up תְּרוֹמְמֵ֑נִי <S%H7311><s%> yea thou liftest me up מֵאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man חָ֝מָ֗ס <S%H2555><s%> me from the violent תַּצִּילֵֽנִי׃ <S%H5337><s%> against me thou hast delivered

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֤ן ׀ <S%H3651><s%> after that אוֹדְךָ֖ <S%H3034><s%> Therefore will I give thanks בַגּוֹיִ֥ם ׀ <S%H1471><s%> among the heathen יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto thee O LORD וּלְשִׁמְךָ֥ <S%H8034><s%> unto thy name אֲזַמֵּֽרָה׃ <S%H2167><s%> and sing praises

[מִגְדֹּל כ] (מַגְדִּיל֮ <S%H2167><s%> give praise ק) יְשׁוּע֪וֹת <S%H3444><s%> deliverance מַ֫לְכּ֥וֹ <S%H4428><s%> giveth he to his king וְעֹ֤שֶׂה <S%H6213><s%> and sheweth חֶ֨סֶד ׀ <S%H2617><s%> mercy לִמְשִׁיח֗וֹ <S%H4899><s%> to his anointed לְדָוִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> to David וּלְזַרְע֗וֹ <S%H2233><s%> and to his seed עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> evermore
